name: Grim Facade: The Red Cat - Hidden Objects
name_original: Grim Facade: The Red Cat - Hidden Objects
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

A killer is on the loose in the city of Venice, and he’s marking his victims by painting a red cat on their door before he strikes. The next target is the Mayor’s son, and you’ve been called in to help protect him before the Red Cat kills again. The object of his plot seems to be revenge, but there may be a lot more hidden in the shadows of this mystery!

• WHO IS THIS MAN IN THE STRANGE FELINE MASK?
The Red Cat is definitely out for vengeance, but what connects his targets to one another? The answer may be the key to cracking this case!

• CAN YOU SAVE THE RED CAT’S NEXT TARGET?
Prevent another gruesome murder by diving into sensational hidden object scenes.

• CAPTURE MEMORY FRAGMENTS WITH YOUR SPECIAL DEVICE
Collect moments of the past to help you solve tricky puzzles and cryptic mini-games.

• CONTINUE THIS THRILLING ADVENTURE IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Play another side of this case and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Spiders, morphing objects, and more!
